hero.subtitle: SAVE TOGETHER, GROW TOGETHER.
hero.description: Volcan d'Or is a mobile app that allows Moroccan and MENA families to create savings portfolios for their children or family goals, and participate in 100% digital, secure, and automated tontine (Daret) cycles.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Volcan d’Or is a mobile application developed by the Moroccan startup Technologies d’Or, created to deliver inclusive digital solutions with a strong social impact.

services.description: Volcan d'Or is an innovative mobile app dedicated to family and community savings. It helps Moroccan families and those in the MENA region secure their children’s future and achieve financial goals through two main services.
services.portfolios_desc: Dedicated savings portfolios for each child or family goal.
services.point1: Create a savings portfolio for each child or goal
services.point2: Set an amount, duration, and saving frequency
services.point3: Top up your Wallet using local payment methods
services.point4: Money is automatically transferred to each portfolio
services.point5: Track your savings progress in real time
services.tontine_desc: Digital tontine service among friends, family, colleagues, or neighbors.
services.tontine_point1: Create or join a group with your loved ones
services.tontine_point2: Set the rules for the Jama pot
services.tontine_point3: Each member contributes on time according to a predefined schedule
services.tontine_point4: Receive your savings and enjoy your turn

innovation.social_network_desc: Volcan d'Or allows users to post, comment, like, share, and repost like on a social network. A real community of savers is built to encourage support and inspiration around financial goals.
innovation.ai_assistant_desc: Gold AI is an integrated smart micro assistant based on artificial intelligence that responds via audio or text, advises on the best saving strategies depending on profiles, and simplifies navigation and usage of the app.
innovation.wallet_desc: The integrated Wallet allows users to easily top up via bank cards, Omani Cash, etc. It is used to pay subscription cycles and transfer money to savings portfolios.
innovation.security_desc: Thanks to integration with Wizaj.ma for legalized contract signing, identity verification via NFC or ID scan, and secure storage, Volcan d'Or provides a reliable experience for every user.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.desc: Make saving simple, accessible, and secure for everyone by leveraging technology and local culture of mutual aid.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.desc: Build a safer future for upcoming generations through digital saving solutions tailored to the needs of families in Morocco and Africa.

financial_security.title: Financial Security
financial_security.desc: Your funds are protected and locked until the chosen date

ease_of_use.title: Ease of Use
ease_of_use.desc: Manage everything in a few clicks from your mobile

inclusive.title: Inclusive
inclusive.desc: Accessible even without a bank account

saida.name: Saïda EL Idrissi
saida.text: Thanks to Volcan d'Or, I have been able to save every month for my son's studies. The app is clear, easy, and reassuring.

monir.name: Mounir Nassiri
monir.text: I’ve been participating in a Daret for 6 months, everything is automated. No stress, no forgetting!

secured_funds.a: Yes. Funds are stored in partner bank accounts and your data is encrypted.

how_daret_works.a: Each member pays a monthly contribution. Each turn, one receives the total amount.

who_can_use.a: Anyone residing in Morocco or a MENA country. You only need a phone and an ID card.

footer.company_description: is an innovative mobile app dedicated to family and community savings.
